definition.text: Why would I want to have multiple strategies within a trading system, when only one of them may trade at any point?

paragraphs.text: Before answering the burning question, let's take a look at a couple of examples. Take a look at the two strategies within the Weak-hands Buster (WHB v2) trading system!
Explore the definitions of the Trigger On Event on the Trigger Stage and see if you notice the difference between the two.
There's a hint in the name of each strategy!
